name: testflight-watcher
description: testflight-watcher is a self-hosted tool that monitors TestFlight public betas and alerts when new spots are available or builds are updated, helping users catch limited beta openings automatically.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications immediately when beta slots open up or new builds are published

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track multiple TestFlight apps simultaneously from a single dashboard

features.title: Notification Channels
features.description: Send alerts via email, Telegram, Discord, or webhooks to your preferred platform

features.title: REST API
features.description: Configure check frequency per app to balance responsiveness with API rate limits
